history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> Do you need parking information around UPMC Presby campus?
USER yes
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to park? I can provide parking information around UPMC Presby, UPMC Montefiore, Kaufmann medical building, or Falk Clinic.
USER fuck Clinic
TTS Where do you want to park? I can provide parking information around UPMC Presby, UPMC Montefiore, Kaufmann medical building, or Falk Clinic.
USER Falk Clinic
TTS <speak> Valet parking is available in the <break strength='weak'/> rear driveway of Falk Medical Building, available on weekdays from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m..<break time='800ms'/></speak>
TTS <speak> I can also help with trip planning. <break strength='strong'/> Do you want public transit directions or driving directions
USER driving
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER UPMC Presby
TTS Okay, going to upmc presbyterian. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 04:05 pm.
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 5 minutes..
Head north on Morewood avenue toward Fifth avenue..
Turn left onto Fifth avenue..
Continue straight to stay on Fifth avenue. Pass by Starbucks . ..
Turn right onto Lothrop Street.
Turn right at Victoria Street Destination will be on the left..
TTS <speak> Do you need further directions to a particular doctor's office?
USER yes
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will help you to find a doctor's office. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is the doctor's full name?
USER David Hamilton
TTS <speak> I found david hamilton's office to be <break strength='strong' /> Suite A-402 at <break strength='weak'/> Department of Neurological Surgery <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Sears
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER yes
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
